    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función seno y circunferencia goniométrica</string>
            <string language="en">Sine function and unit circle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sinusfunktion und -maßeinheit Kreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cercle de fonction et d'unité de sinus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Círculo da função e da unidade do seno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cerchio di funzione e dell'unità di seno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργία ημιτόνου και κύκλος μονάδων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que dibuja la gráfica de la función seno a partir de la representación del seno en una circunferencia goniométrica</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which draws the graph of the sine function based on the representation of the sine in the unit circle</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">circunferencia</string>
            <string language="en">circumference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">goniométrica</string>
            <string language="en">unit circle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">seno</string>
            <string language="en">sine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die das Diagramm der 
Sinusfunktion zeichnet, gründete auf der Darstellung des Sinus im 
Maßeinheit Kreis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la simulation interactive qui trace le graphique 
de la fonction de sinus a basé sur la représentation du sinus en 
cercle d'unité</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a simulação interativa que desenha o gráfico 
da função do seno baseou na respresentação do seno no círculo da 
unidade</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la simulazione interattiva che traccia il grafico
della funzione di seno ha basato sulla rappresentazione del seno nel 
cerchio dell'unità</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που σύρει τη γραφική παράσταση 
της λειτουργίας ημιτόνου βασισμένης στην αντιπροσώπευση του 
ημιτόνου στον κύκλο μονάδων</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßeinheit Kreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
